message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a very reasonable price of $12,000.  I know you'll find it valuable.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with a price of $10,500. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
